Medium: 68 lithographs (including head- and tailpieces), 53 printed in color and 15 printed in black; 1 lithographed ornament; 1 wood engraving (wrapper front), printed in black; and collotype table of plates
Dimensions:
irreg. page  15 1/8 x 11" (38 x 28 cm)
Prints:  various dimensions.
Date: 1936.  (Commissioned by Vollard; completed, printed, and published by Lucien Vol
